title: [Solved] torch.nn.CrossEntropyLoss Numerical Error?
body_html:
In my own network (2 Conv2D + 3 FC) it consistently gets 1~2% lower acc than this implement of CrossEntropy+Softmax as well as Keras. Can't reproduce on shallower networks.

Actually that implement returns 2*grad of the orig. implement.
body_text:
In my own network (2 Conv2D + 3 FC) it consistently gets 1~2% lower acc than this implement of CrossEntropy+Softmax as well as Keras. Can't reproduce on shallower networks.

body:
~~In my own network (2 Conv2D + 3 FC) it consistently gets 1~2% lower acc than this [implement of CrossEntropy+Softmax](https://github.com/Jiaming-Liu/pytorch-misc/blob/master/softmax_with_cross_entropy_loss.py) as well as Keras. Can't reproduce on shallower networks.~~

Actually that implement returns 2*grad of the orig. implement.
